nodes.bodyText: Could u please add java joc here?
change the log body to "Error while serializing structure record {}" to align with method name.
quick question, will precision loose if we handle MILLIS the same with MICROS? Or it does not matter when we convert them to String?
yea it will take care of it upto nano seconds
Since the put and get needs to have the Gson configured exactly the same, it is better to refactor it out to a private method createGson()
This can be a static constant.
Why the serialize and deserialize are not symmetric?

serialization will serialize logical types as string. For deserialize in preview mode, we would always want logical type fields as string. However, that does not comply with avro schema. Meaning, for non preview we would want structured records to contain original primitive types(not string) for logical type fields.
